contents.description: Quests will be geared towards heroes of certain levels. Heroes outside of that level may participate in the quest but will not earn a quest card.

children.value: Quests will be geared towards heroes of certain levels. Heroes outside of that level may participate in the quest but will not earn a quest card.
Each player starts with 24 points they can distribute to any of the attributes.
Max level of any attribut is 18

1-4 is lacking
5-8 is below average
9-12 is average
13-16 is above average
17-18 is mastery
For every 4 levels, add 1 to damage roll
Add 1 to your challenge roll, or

Requirements
Apprentice plus 18 experience
Must choose an order
Receives
2 Skills

Requirements
Journeyman plus 36 experience
Must have one attribute above average
Receives
4 Skills

Requirements
Adept plus 72 experience
Must have mastery in one ability
Receives
4 Skills

Requirements
Expert plus 108 experience
Must have 2 attributes at mastery
Receives
8 Skills

d4 - Scrapes and Bruises
d6 - Cuts
d8 - Break Bones
d10 - Fatal Strikes

contents.title: Centaurs
contents.description: You will have the lower body of a horse, but the upper body of a human. You'll have an affinity for the order of nature.

children.value: You will have the lower body of a horse, but the upper body of a human. You'll have an affinity for the order of nature.

contents.title: The Order of Battle
contents.description: Study the arts of killing and become a master.

children.value: Study the arts of killing and become a master.

contents.title: The Order of Elements
contents.description: Harness the power all around you, through the use of air, earth, fire, and water.

children.value: Harness the power all around you, through the use of air, earth, fire, and water.

contents.title: The Order of Life
contents.description: Learn to take the life of your enemies, give life to your friends, and even increase your own life.

children.value: Learn to take the life of your enemies, give life to your friends, and even increase your own life.

contents.title: The Order of Nature
contents.description: Tap into the power of Earth

children.value: Tap into the power of Earth

contents.title: The Order of Shadows
contents.description: They can blend into their environment and kill from the shadows

children.value: They can blend into their environment and kill from the shadows
